鴛鴦.definition: (bird species of China) mandarin duck (Aix galericulata); (fig.) affectionate couple; happily married couple

鴛鴦戲水.definition: lit. mandarin ducks playing in the water; fig. to make love

鴛鴦浴.definition: taking a bath together as a couple

鴛鴦蝴蝶.definition: Mandarin ducks and butterfly (i.e. love birds); derogatory reference to populist and romantic writing around 1900

鴛鴦蝴蝶派.definition: Mandarin ducks and butterfly (i.e. love birds) literary school around 1900, criticized as populist and romantic by socialist realists

鴛鴦鍋.definition: "mandarin ducks" pot (hot pot with a divider, containing spicy soup on one side, mild soup on the other)
